data.content:
Malzahar (Default)

Cost: N/A | Release Date: N/A

Malzahar, the Prophet of the Void, is a powerful mage in the world of League of Legends. With his dark and enigmatic powers, he has the ability to control the void and summon otherworldly creatures to aid him in battle. As one of the original champions in the game, Malzahar's default skin represents his iconic appearance and serves as the foundation for his various alternate skins.

The default skin for Malzahar features him in a long, flowing robe adorned with intricate patterns and symbols. The robe is predominantly purple, reflecting his connection to the void, and is complemented by gold accents that add an air of mystique to his appearance. Malzahar's face is concealed by a hood, casting a shadow over his eyes and adding to his mysterious aura. His hands are covered in dark energy, crackling with power as he channels the void.

The default skin perfectly captures the essence of Malzahar, showcasing his affiliation with the void and his role as a prophet. The intricate details on his robe and the dark energy emanating from his hands highlight his mastery over the void's power. Whether players choose to stick with the default skin or explore the various alternate skins available for Malzahar, this classic appearance remains a fan favorite.

Malzahar's Story

Malzahar's story is deeply intertwined with the void, a dark and chaotic dimension that threatens to consume the world of Runeterra. As a young seer from Shurima, Malzahar was plagued by visions of the void, driving him to the brink of madness. Desperate to find answers, he ventured into the desert, where he discovered an ancient artifact known as the

Upon touching the Void Stone, Malzahar's mind was flooded with forbidden knowledge and he became consumed by the void's power. He emerged as the Prophet of the Void, a figure who believed that the only way to save Runeterra was to embrace the void and bring about its inevitable convergence with the mortal realm. With his newfound powers, Malzahar sought to spread the influence of the void, recruiting followers known as the

to aid him in his mission.

In the world of League of Legends, Malzahar is a mage who excels at controlling the battlefield and isolating his enemies. His Void Swarm ability allows him to summon voidlings to attack his foes, while his Malefic Visions ability infects enemies with a damaging curse that spreads to nearby targets. His ultimate ability, Nether Grasp, immobilizes a single enemy champion, dealing damage over time and suppressing them for a brief period.

While Malzahar possesses formidable offensive capabilities, he is relatively fragile and lacks mobility. His reliance on channeling abilities leaves him vulnerable to crowd control and interrupts, making positioning and timing crucial for success. However, his ability to suppress and eliminate high-priority targets makes him a valuable asset in team fights and skirmishes.

Throughout his journey, Malzahar has become a prominent figure in the League of Legends lore. His actions and beliefs have had a significant impact on the world, and his interactions with other champions have shaped the course of events. Whether players choose to embrace his dark path or oppose his vision, Malzahar's story continues to unfold, offering new insights into the depths of the void and the consequences of tampering with its power.

To learn more about Malzahar and his various appearances in League of Legends, including his alternate skins, players can visit this page. Here, they can find detailed information, videos, and images showcasing the different looks and themes associated with this enigmatic champion. Whether you prefer the classic default skin or wish to explore the depths of the void with one of his alternate skins, Malzahar offers a unique and captivating gameplay experience.

Malzahar: The Prophet of the Void

Release Date: June 1, 2010

Malzahar, the Prophet of the Void, is a powerful mage in the game League of Legends. With his deep connection to the void and his ability to manipulate dark energy, Malzahar is a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield. In this article, we will delve into his story, explore his strengths and weaknesses, discuss his background in the game, and highlight his significance in the League of Legends universe.

The Story of Malzahar

Malzahar's origins lie in the deserts of Shurima, a once-great empire that fell into ruin. He was a seer who possessed a unique gift of prophecy, but his visions were plagued by darkness and despair. Consumed by his visions, Malzahar sought answers and found himself drawn to the void, a dimension of dark energy and unimaginable power.

As he delved deeper into the void, Malzahar's mind became corrupted, and he became the vessel through which the void spoke. The void granted him immense power, but at a great cost. Malzahar's sanity was shattered, and he became a prophet, spreading the word of the void and seeking to bring about its ultimate convergence with the mortal realm.

Driven by his newfound purpose, Malzahar became a cult leader, gathering followers who believed in the power of the void. He used his dark magic to manipulate and control those around him, bending them to his will. With his followers, he set out to bring about the end of the world as they knew it, believing that only through the void's embrace could true enlightenment be achieved.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Malzahar possesses a unique set of strengths and weaknesses that make him a formidable champion in League of Legends. His primary strength lies in his ability to control and suppress his enemies with his void magic. His Q ability,

sends out a wave of dark energy that damages and silences enemies caught in its path. This ability is particularly effective in team fights, as it can disrupt enemy spellcasting and leave them vulnerable to follow-up attacks.

Another strength of Malzahar is his E ability,

This ability infects an enemy with a voidling, which deals damage over time and spreads to nearby enemies upon the target's death. Malefic Visions allows Malzahar to apply constant pressure on his opponents, forcing them to either stay away from minions or risk taking damage and spreading the void's influence.

Furthermore, Malzahar's ultimate ability,

is a powerful suppression spell that immobilizes an enemy champion and deals damage over time. This ability can single-handedly turn the tide of a team fight, as it locks down a high-priority target and allows Malzahar and his team to focus their damage on them.

However, Malzahar does have weaknesses that can be exploited by skilled opponents. One of his main weaknesses is his lack of mobility. Malzahar is a relatively immobile champion, making him susceptible to ganks and assassinations if caught out of position. Skilled players can take advantage of this weakness by coordinating with their team to catch Malzahar off guard and eliminate him before he can unleash his devastating abilities.

Additionally, Malzahar's reliance on his voidlings for damage makes him vulnerable to crowd control effects that can quickly dispatch his summoned creatures. Champions with strong burst damage or crowd control abilities can disrupt Malzahar's damage output and render him less effective in team fights.

Malzahar's Background in the Game

In League of Legends, Malzahar is classified as a mage and is primarily played in the mid lane. His kit revolves around dealing sustained damage over time and controlling the battlefield with his void magic. He excels at pushing waves and roaming to other lanes to assist his teammates.

Malzahar's passive ability,

grants him a spell shield that blocks the next crowd control effect and restores mana upon activation. This passive ability provides him with a layer of protection against crowd control effects, allowing him to stay in the fight longer and continue dealing damage.

As players progress through the game, Malzahar's abilities become increasingly potent. His voidlings become stronger and deal more damage, while his ultimate ability gains additional effects, such as increased range and damage amplification. Skilled Malzahar players can use these enhanced abilities to dominate team fights and secure kills.

Malzahar's Place in the Game

Malzahar holds a significant place in the League of Legends universe, both in terms of lore and gameplay. Lore-wise, he is a key figure in the ongoing conflict between the void and the mortal realm. His actions and beliefs shape the narrative of the game, and his interactions with other champions provide insight into the complex relationships within the League of Legends universe.

In terms of gameplay, Malzahar offers a unique playstyle that combines burst damage, crowd control, and zone control. His ability to suppress and silence enemies makes him a valuable asset in team fights, as he can neutralize high-threat targets and disrupt enemy strategies. His voidlings also provide additional damage and pressure, making him a versatile champion in various situations.

Furthermore, Malzahar has a wide range of skins available, each offering a unique visual and thematic experience. Players can access information and videos of all the skins on the dedicated page for Malzahar on our website, allowing them to explore the different options and choose the one that best suits their preferences.

In conclusion, Malzahar is a powerful mage with a dark connection to the void. His abilities to control and manipulate the void's energy make him a formidable champion in League of Legends. While he possesses strengths such as crowd control and sustained damage, he also has weaknesses that can be exploited by skilled opponents. With his rich lore and unique gameplay, Malzahar holds a significant place in the League of Legends universe, offering players an engaging and strategic experience on the battlefield.

Malzahar (Hextech Malzahar)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: November 10, 2016

Malzahar, the Prophet of the Void, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With his dark and mysterious powers, he has captivated players since his release in 2010. Over the years, Malzahar has received various skins, each offering a unique visual and thematic twist to his character. One such skin is the

which was released on November 10, 2016, and can be purchased for 1350 RP.

The Hextech Malzahar skin takes the Prophet of the Void to a whole new level, transforming him into a futuristic and technologically advanced version of himself. This skin features a sleek black and blue color scheme, with intricate hextech patterns adorning his armor. The Voidling creatures that accompany Malzahar also receive a futuristic makeover, with glowing blue energy emanating from their bodies.

One of the standout features of the Hextech Malzahar skin is the unique visual effects it brings to the champion's abilities. When casting his Q ability, Call of the Void, Malzahar unleashes a wave of hextech energy that ripples through the ground, leaving a trail of blue particles in its wake. His W ability, Void Swarm, summons futuristic voidlings that swarm around enemies, leaving behind a trail of blue energy as they attack. The E ability, Malefic Visions, infects enemies with a hextech virus, causing them to take damage over time while being surrounded by blue particles. Finally, his ultimate ability, Nether Grasp, immobilizes enemies with a powerful beam of hextech energy, enveloping them in a blue vortex.

Aside from the stunning visual effects, the Hextech Malzahar skin also features new sound effects that further enhance the futuristic theme. The voiceover for this skin is altered, giving Malzahar a more mechanical and otherworldly tone. These small details add to the overall immersion and make playing as Hextech Malzahar a truly unique experience.

Now, let's delve into the lore and story behind Malzahar and his place in the League of Legends universe. Malzahar was once a seer from Shurima, a powerful empire that fell into ruin. He became obsessed with the Void, a dark and dangerous dimension that threatened to consume Runeterra. In his quest for knowledge and power, Malzahar lost himself to the Void, becoming its prophet and spreading its influence.

In the game, Malzahar is a mage who excels at controlling and suppressing his enemies. His passive ability, Void Shift, grants him a shield when he hasn't taken damage for a few seconds, making him resilient in fights. His Q ability, Call of the Void, sends out a wave of energy that damages and silences enemies caught in its path. His W ability, Void Swarm, summons voidlings that attack nearby enemies, dealing additional damage. The E ability, Malefic Visions, infects enemies with a void virus, causing them to take damage over time. Finally, his ultimate ability, Nether Grasp, suppresses a single enemy champion, dealing damage over time and rendering them unable to move or cast abilities.

Malzahar's playstyle revolves around setting up his abilities to maximize damage and crowd control. He excels at catching out-of-position enemies and locking them down with his ultimate, making him a potent pick in team fights and skirmishes. However, he is relatively squishy and vulnerable to crowd control himself, requiring careful positioning and timing to be effective.

Throughout his journey in League of Legends, Malzahar has received several skins that offer players different visual and thematic experiences. From the menacing Shadow Prince Malzahar to the cosmic-themed Dark Star Malzahar, each skin brings a fresh take on the champion's appearance and abilities.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Malzahar's appearances, including the Hextech Malzahar skin. Whether you prefer the futuristic hextech aesthetic or the cosmic grandeur of the Dark Star skin, there's a Malzahar skin to suit every taste.

Malzahar (Battle Boss Malzahar)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: August 1, 2017

Malzahar, the Prophet of the Void, has always been a mysterious and enigmatic champion in the world of League of Legends. With his dark and otherworldly powers, he has captivated players with his unique playstyle and lore. One of the most exciting additions to his collection of skins is the

costume, which brings a whole new level of excitement and nostalgia to the game.

Released on August 1, 2017, the Battle Boss Malzahar skin takes inspiration from classic arcade games, where players would battle against powerful bosses in epic showdowns. This skin transforms Malzahar into a formidable boss character, complete with vibrant colors, pixelated effects, and a retro arcade aesthetic.

The Battle Boss Malzahar skin is priced at 1350 RP, making it a mid-tier skin in terms of cost. However, the level of detail and unique animations it offers make it well worth the investment for fans of Malzahar and arcade-themed skins.

Details of the Costume

When it comes to the Battle Boss Malzahar skin, every aspect has been carefully designed to immerse players in the world of classic arcade games. From his appearance to his abilities, this skin truly captures the essence of a boss character.

First and foremost, Malzahar himself undergoes a complete transformation. He dons a sleek, futuristic suit with glowing neon accents, giving him a powerful and intimidating presence on the battlefield. His Voidlings, which are an integral part of his kit, also receive a makeover, taking on the appearance of pixelated minions that perfectly fit the arcade theme.

The abilities of Battle Boss Malzahar are where this skin truly shines. His Q ability, Call of the Void, summons a pixelated void rift that explodes upon impact, leaving behind a trail of pixelated destruction. His W ability, Void Swarm, releases pixelated Voidlings that swarm around him, ready to attack his enemies. The E ability, Malefic Visions, infects enemies with a pixelated virus, causing them to take damage over time. Finally, his ultimate ability, Nether Grasp, immobilizes his target with a pixelated beam of energy, leaving them vulnerable to his team's attacks.

Additionally, Battle Boss Malzahar features unique recall animations, sound effects, and voice lines that further enhance the arcade experience. From the pixelated effects when he recalls to the retro-inspired voice lines, every detail has been carefully crafted to transport players back to the golden age of arcade gaming.

The Story of Malzahar

Malzahar, also known as the Prophet of the Void, has a rich and intriguing backstory within the League of Legends universe. He hails from Shurima, a once-great empire that fell into ruin. Malzahar was a seer who became obsessed with the mysteries of the Void, a dark and chaotic dimension beyond the known world.

Driven by his visions and the whispers of the Void, Malzahar abandoned his former life and set out on a quest to unlock the secrets of the Void. He believed that the Void held the key to salvation and enlightenment, and he was willing to sacrifice everything to achieve his goals.

As he delved deeper into the Void, Malzahar's mind became consumed by its power. He became a vessel for the Void's influence, gaining immense dark powers and the ability to summon Voidlings to do his bidding. With his newfound abilities, Malzahar sought to spread the influence of the Void throughout the world, believing that it was the only path to true enlightenment.

In the game, Malzahar is a mage champion who excels at controlling and suppressing his enemies. His Voidlings provide additional damage and zoning potential, while his ultimate ability, Nether Grasp, allows him to lock down a single target, making them vulnerable to his team's attacks. However, Malzahar's power comes at a cost, as he is relatively immobile and vulnerable to crowd control effects.

Despite his weaknesses, Malzahar has found a place in the game as a powerful pick in both solo queue and professional play. His ability to control team fights and pick off priority targets makes him a valuable asset to any team composition.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Malzahar's appearances, including the Battle Boss Malzahar skin. Whether you're a fan of his classic look or want to experience the thrill of battling as a boss character, the Battle Boss Malzahar skin is a must-have for any Malzahar enthusiast.

Malzahar (Djinn Malzahar)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: November 10, 2011

Malzahar, the Prophet of the Void, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With his dark and mysterious powers, he has captivated players since his release in 2010. Over the years, Malzahar has received several skins, each offering a unique twist to his appearance and abilities. One such skin is the Djinn Malzahar, which was released on November 10, 2011, and can be purchased for 1350 RP.

The Djinn Malzahar skin takes the champion's already enigmatic persona and amplifies it with a touch of Arabian mystique. In this skin, Malzahar transforms into a powerful Djinn, a supernatural being from Middle Eastern folklore. His appearance is adorned with intricate golden patterns, flowing robes, and a majestic headdress. The skin also introduces new visual effects and animations, giving Malzahar a truly otherworldly presence on the battlefield.

One of the most striking features of the Djinn Malzahar skin is the transformation of his Voidlings. In his default appearance, Malzahar summons Voidlings, small creatures from the Void, to aid him in battle. However, with the Djinn Malzahar skin, these Voidlings are replaced by ethereal spirits that perfectly complement the theme of the skin. These spectral beings hover around Malzahar, ready to strike fear into the hearts of his enemies.

Furthermore, the Djinn Malzahar skin brings new visual effects to Malzahar's abilities. His Q ability, Call of the Void, unleashes a swirling vortex of sand and energy, while his W ability, Void Swarm, summons a swarm of spectral insects. His E ability, Malefic Visions, infects enemies with a dark curse, causing them to wither away under the Djinn's power. Finally, his ultimate ability, Nether Grasp, ensnares his target with dark tendrils, immobilizing them as they succumb to the Djinn's control.

Now that we have explored the details of the Djinn Malzahar skin, let's delve into the story of Malzahar himself. In the vast universe of League of Legends, Malzahar is a seer who was once a mortal man. He was consumed by his obsession with the Void, a dark and chaotic dimension that exists parallel to the world of Runeterra. Through his relentless pursuit of knowledge, Malzahar lost his sanity and became a vessel for the Void's power.

Malzahar's abilities reflect his connection to the Void. His passive ability, Void Shift, grants him a shield that absorbs damage when he remains out of combat for a short period. His Q ability, Call of the Void, sends out a wave of energy that damages and silences enemies caught in its path. His W ability, Void Swarm, summons Voidlings to attack his foes. His E ability, Malefic Visions, infects enemies with a curse that deals damage over time and spreads to nearby targets upon their demise. Finally, his ultimate ability, Nether Grasp, allows him to suppress a target, dealing damage over time and rendering them immobile.

In the game, Malzahar is primarily played as a mid-lane mage. His ability to control space and deal sustained damage makes him a formidable opponent. He excels at pushing waves and roaming to other lanes, using his ultimate ability to lock down priority targets and secure kills for his team. However, Malzahar's immobility and reliance on his ultimate for crowd control make him vulnerable to coordinated ganks and crowd control from enemy champions.

Throughout his existence in League of Legends, Malzahar has undergone various changes and updates to maintain balance and enhance the player experience. His abilities have been tweaked, his visuals have been improved, and his lore has been expanded upon. The Djinn Malzahar skin is just one of the many ways players can customize their experience with this intriguing champion.

If you want to learn more about Malzahar and his different appearances, you can find detailed information and videos on his dedicated page. Explore the depths of the Void and embrace the power of the Djinn as you command Malzahar in battle.

Malzahar (Three Honors Malzahar)

RP: 1350 | Release Date: November 10, 2021

Malzahar, the Prophet of the Void, has always been a mysterious and enigmatic champion in the world of League of Legends. With his ability to tap into the dark powers of the Void, he has become a formidable force on the Summoner's Rift. And now, with the release of the

skin, players have the opportunity to witness a new side of this powerful champion.

The

skin is a visually stunning addition to Malzahar's repertoire. With its intricate design and attention to detail, this skin truly captures the essence of the Void Prophet. The skin features a dark and ethereal color palette, with shades of purple and black dominating the overall look. Malzahar himself is adorned in a flowing robe, adorned with intricate patterns and symbols that represent his connection to the Void. His voidlings, which are his loyal companions in battle, also receive a makeover, taking on a more menacing and otherworldly appearance.

One of the standout features of the

skin is the unique particle effects it brings to the game. When casting his abilities, Malzahar unleashes a flurry of purple energy, crackling with power. The voidlings also leave behind a trail of purple mist as they move, adding an extra layer of visual appeal to the skin. Additionally, the skin comes with new sound effects, further immersing players in the dark and mysterious world of Malzahar.

But what sets the

skin apart from others is the three distinct forms that Malzahar can take on during the game. As the game progresses and Malzahar gains levels, he will transform into different versions of himself, each representing a different aspect of his power. These forms include the Ascendant, the Voidbringer, and the Harbinger. Each form comes with its own unique visual effects and animations, making the skin a truly dynamic and engaging experience.

Now, let's delve into the lore and story of Malzahar himself. Born in the deserts of Shurima, Malzahar was once a seer who became obsessed with the mysteries of the Void. He believed that the end of the world was imminent and that the only way to save humanity was to embrace the power of the Void. In his quest for knowledge, he ventured deep into the desert, where he encountered a dark entity known as the Void. The encounter left him forever changed, as he became the vessel through which the Void's power flowed.

In the game, Malzahar is a mage champion who excels at controlling and suppressing his enemies. His passive ability, Void Shift, grants him a shield when he hasn't taken damage for a certain period of time, making him resilient in team fights. His Q ability, Call of the Void, sends out a wave of energy that damages and silences enemies caught in its path. Malefic Visions, his W ability, infects enemies with a voidling that deals damage over time and spreads to nearby targets upon killing the infected unit. His E ability, Void Swarm, summons voidlings to aid him in battle, attacking nearby enemies. Finally, his ultimate ability, Nether Grasp, suppresses a single enemy champion, dealing damage over time and rendering them unable to move or cast abilities.

Malzahar's strengths lie in his ability to control team fights and pick off isolated targets. His ultimate ability, Nether Grasp, can single-handedly eliminate a high-priority target, making him a valuable asset in coordinated team play. Additionally, his voidlings provide additional damage and pressure in fights, making it difficult for enemies to escape his grasp. However, Malzahar is relatively immobile and vulnerable to crowd control, making him susceptible to ganks and dives if caught out of position.

In the world of League of Legends, Malzahar holds a unique place as one of the few champions who can tap into the power of the Void. His dark and mysterious nature, combined with his powerful abilities, make him a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield. Whether you're a fan of his lore or simply enjoy playing a mage champion with strong crowd control, Malzahar is a champion worth exploring.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Malzahar's appearances, including the
skin. Dive into the world of the Void Prophet and experience the power of the Void for yourself.

Malzahar (Beezahar)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: April 1, 2022

Malzahar, the Prophet of the Void, has always been a mysterious and enigmatic champion in the world of League of Legends. With his ability to commune with the Void and harness its dark powers, he has become a formidable force on the Summoner's Rift. However, even the most serious and devoted champions need a break from time to time, and that's where the Beezahar skin comes in.

Released on April 1, 2022, the Beezahar skin offers a whimsical and lighthearted twist to Malzahar's dark and brooding persona. This skin transforms him into a beekeeper, complete with a beekeeper's hat, bee-themed abilities, and a swarm of buzzing bees following him wherever he goes.

Let's delve into the details of this delightful skin. Beezahar's appearance is a sight to behold. Malzahar himself is dressed in a beekeeper's outfit, complete with a white suit, black gloves, and boots. His head is adorned with a large beekeeper's hat, featuring a mesh veil to protect him from the bees he commands. The hat is adorned with a golden bee emblem, signifying his mastery over these buzzing creatures.

Malzahar's abilities have also undergone a bee-themed transformation. His Q ability, Call of the Void, now summons a swarm of bees that fly towards his enemies, stinging them with their venomous stingers. His W ability, Void Swarm, releases a horde of bees that attack nearby enemies, dealing damage over time. The E ability, Malefic Visions, infects enemies with a bee-shaped curse, causing them to be haunted by a swarm of bees until the curse is broken. Finally, his ultimate ability, Nether Grasp, immobilizes his target while a massive bee descends upon them, dealing devastating damage.

Playing as Beezahar adds a touch of whimsy to the game. The constant buzzing of bees following Malzahar creates a unique and immersive experience. The vibrant yellow and black color scheme of the skin adds a splash of color to the battlefield, making Malzahar stand out among the other champions.

Now, let's take a moment to explore the story of Malzahar and his place in the League of Legends universe. Malzahar was once a seer from Shurima, driven mad by his visions of the Void. He became obsessed with the idea of the Void consuming the world and sought to bring about its arrival. In his quest for power, he made a pact with the Void, becoming its prophet and gaining immense dark powers.

In the game, Malzahar is a mage who excels at controlling and suppressing his enemies. His Voidlings, summoned through his passive ability, Void Shift, aid him in battle, attacking his foes and providing additional damage. His Q ability, Call of the Void, sends out a wave of energy that damages and silences enemies caught in its path. His W ability, Void Swarm, summons Voidlings to aid him in battle. His E ability, Malefic Visions, infects enemies with a curse that deals damage over time and spreads to nearby enemies upon the target's death. Finally, his ultimate ability, Nether Grasp, suppresses a target, dealing damage over time and rendering them unable to move or cast abilities.

Malzahar's strengths lie in his ability to control the battlefield and suppress key targets. His ultimate ability, Nether Grasp, can single-handedly eliminate high-priority targets, making him a valuable asset in team fights. His Voidlings provide additional damage and can overwhelm enemies if left unchecked. However, Malzahar is relatively squishy and lacks mobility, making him vulnerable to assassins and champions with high burst damage.

Throughout his journey in the League of Legends universe, Malzahar has become a fan-favorite champion due to his unique playstyle and intriguing lore. Whether you're a seasoned Malzahar player or just discovering the champion for the first time, the Beezahar skin offers a refreshing and light-hearted take on this dark and mysterious character.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Malzahar's appearances, including the Beezahar skin. Explore the different skins and discover the one that best suits your playstyle and aesthetic preferences. Embrace the power of the Void and unleash your inner prophet with Malzahar!

Malzahar (Debonair Malzahar)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: November 29, 2012

Malzahar, the Prophet of the Void, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his dark and mysterious nature, Malzahar has captivated players with his unique abilities and intriguing backstory. One of the many skins available for Malzahar is the

skin, which offers a fresh and sophisticated look for the champion.

The Debonair Malzahar skin was released on November 29, 2012, and quickly became a favorite among players. Priced at 975 RP, this skin offers a stylish and dapper appearance for Malzahar, transforming him into a refined gentleman of the Void. With its sleek design and attention to detail, the Debonair Malzahar skin truly stands out on the battlefield.

When equipped with the Debonair Malzahar skin, the champion undergoes a complete visual transformation. His usual dark and ominous attire is replaced with a sophisticated suit, complete with a bowtie and a top hat. The color scheme of the skin features shades of black, white, and gold, giving Malzahar an elegant and refined look. Additionally, his Voidlings, which are his summoned creatures, also receive a makeover, appearing as well-dressed minions that perfectly complement Malzahar's new appearance.

Aside from the visual changes, the Debonair Malzahar skin also includes unique particle effects and sound effects. The abilities of the champion are enhanced with a touch of class, as his Voidlings now sport a golden hue and emit a subtle shimmer. The sound effects accompanying Malzahar's abilities are also modified to match the refined theme of the skin, adding an extra layer of immersion to the gameplay experience.

Now, let's delve into the story of Malzahar himself. Born in the deserts of Shurima, Malzahar was once a seer who possessed a deep connection to the Void, a dark and otherworldly dimension. Consumed by his visions, Malzahar became obsessed with the idea of unlocking the secrets of the Void and spreading its influence throughout the world.

Driven by his newfound purpose, Malzahar abandoned his former life and ventured into the desert, seeking the truth that lay beyond the veil of reality. In his quest, he encountered the Void's enigmatic entity known as the Voidborn, which granted him immense power and transformed him into the Prophet of the Void.

With his newfound abilities, Malzahar became a harbinger of destruction, using his dark magic to corrupt and control those who stood in his way. He became a feared figure, capable of summoning Voidlings to aid him in battle and unleashing devastating spells upon his enemies.

In the world of League of Legends, Malzahar is classified as a mage and an assassin. His unique playstyle revolves around his ability to summon Voidlings and control the battlefield with his powerful spells. His passive ability, Void Shift, grants him a shield that absorbs damage when he remains out of combat for a short period of time. This allows him to sustain in fights and survive burst damage.

Malzahar's Q ability, Call of the Void, sends out a wave of energy that damages and silences enemies caught in its path. His W ability, Void Swarm, summons Voidlings that attack nearby enemies, dealing additional damage. His E ability, Malefic Visions, infects an enemy with a spell that deals damage over time and spreads to nearby enemies upon the target's death.

Malzahar's ultimate ability, Nether Grasp, is a powerful suppression spell that immobilizes an enemy champion, dealing damage over time. This ability can be devastating when used in combination with his other spells, allowing him to quickly eliminate high-priority targets.

Despite his formidable abilities, Malzahar does have weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and lacks mobility, making him vulnerable to champions with high burst damage or crowd control abilities. Additionally, his ultimate ability requires him to channel it, leaving him susceptible to interruption if not properly protected by his team.

In the world of League of Legends, Malzahar has become a popular pick for players who enjoy a strategic and calculated playstyle. His ability to control the battlefield and eliminate key targets makes him a valuable asset in team fights. With the Debonair Malzahar skin, players can now showcase their style and sophistication while wreaking havoc on the Rift.

joined Malzahar in his mission to bring about the Void's ascension.

In the game, Malzahar is a mage who excels at controlling and suppressing his enemies. Released on November 10, 2011, Vizier Malzahar quickly became a favorite among players who wanted to experience a different side of the Void Prophet. The skin offers a refreshing take on Malzahar's appearance, showcasing his potential as a ruler and leader rather than a mere prophet.

Now, let's delve into the story behind Malzahar and his place in the League of Legends universe.

The Story of Malzahar

Malzahar was once a seer from the desert lands of Shurima. He possessed a deep fascination with the void, an otherworldly dimension filled with dark and chaotic energy. Consumed by his obsession, Malzahar sought to unravel the mysteries of the void and understand its true nature.

During his relentless pursuit of knowledge, Malzahar discovered a prophecy that foretold the end of the world. According to the prophecy, the void would consume everything, leaving only darkness in its wake. Believing himself to be the chosen one, Malzahar embraced his role as the Prophet of the Void and dedicated his life to bringing about the cataclysmic event.

Malzahar's powers grew exponentially as he delved deeper into the void's secrets. He became a vessel for its dark energy, granting him immense power over the voidlings, otherworldly creatures that serve him faithfully. With his newfound abilities, Malzahar set out to spread the influence of the void, seeking to convert others to his cause.

In the League of Legends, Malzahar is a mage who excels at controlling the battlefield with his void magic. He possesses a unique set of abilities that allow him to summon voidlings, silence his enemies, and suppress their movements. His ultimate ability, Nether Grasp, immobilizes a single target, dealing immense damage over time.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Malzahar's strengths lie in his ability to control the battlefield and pick off isolated targets. His voidlings provide additional damage and serve as distractions, allowing him to focus on his primary target. Additionally, his ultimate ability can single-handedly eliminate high-priority targets, making him a formidable threat in team fights.

However, Malzahar also has his weaknesses. He is relatively immobile and vulnerable to crowd control effects, making him an easy target for assassins and champions with high mobility. Additionally, his voidlings can be easily dispatched by area-of-effect abilities, limiting their effectiveness in certain situations.

Malzahar's Place in the Game

Malzahar is a versatile champion who can be played in various roles, including mid lane and support. His ability to control the battlefield and eliminate key targets makes him a valuable asset to any team composition. In the mid lane, he excels at pushing waves and roaming to other lanes, providing assistance to his teammates.

As a support, Malzahar can provide crowd control and damage amplification to his ADC (Attack Damage Carry). His ability to suppress enemies with his ultimate can turn the tide of team fights and secure kills for his team.

Overall, Malzahar's unique playstyle and thematic appeal make him a popular choice among players. Whether you prefer his default appearance or the majestic Vizier Malzahar skin, you can find more information and videos about all of his appearances on this page.
